website_summaries.verdict: The timeless silhouette of the Nike MD Runner 2 by Nike is ready for the day to day use. This retro sneaker offers both fashion and function. Due to the shoe’s simple yet stylish design, it is street-style ready. Moreover, it provides a long-lasting comfort because of the quality materials this pair features.
pros: Many wearers of the Nike MD Runner 2 find the pair very comfortable for daily use
Several users have noticed that the cushioning of the sneaker around the ankle area provides plenty of support
The shoe is lightweight, according to some reviewers
According to some of the reviews, the MD Runner 2 is easy to wear due to its stylish and versatile silhouette
A lot of buyers admit that they receive compliments while wearing the pair
A number of end-users commend the basic colorways of the sneaker
Many praise the retro sneaker for being not too chunky in its overall design
cons: Despite the support the padding around the ankle provides, some find it too puffy, making their feet look fat
Some complain that the sole is stiff
A small number of users mention that the shoe does not provide arch support

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE !!!
customer_reviews.text: the sole has become detached from the rest of the shoe after 3,5 month's of using it and the color has faded. There is no more support after the return time has finish and no warranty. BE AWARE OF THIS !!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bronka

customer_reviews.title: Nike convert
customer_reviews.text: Not a big Nike fan but I am glad I purchased these bad boys. Comfortable, true to size, good quality and a reasonable price. My only qualms are when I first wore them the rubber soles seemed so slippery on the roads and pavements that I thought I was going to have a tumble. Luckily after a few days of wearing the soles were fine and I hardly take them off nowadays. They have also stood up to a good pounding on the streets each day walking to work. I think I may be a convert and purchase more Nike trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Retro Nix

customer_reviews.title: Go up awhile size for correct fit.
customer_reviews.text: Size 10 usually. Reviews provided good guidance. Suggest you go up to a 11uk to get the right fit. Classic trainer. Can’t go wrong really. Blue over black for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: About one whole size too small, otherwise great trainers.
customer_reviews.text: I usually take a size 10 but as some reviews suggested these are on the small size I ordered a 10.5 and it was still incredibly small. I gave them to my dad who takes a size 9 and he said they were a perfect fit. So I ordered a size 11 and they do fit me but are still quite snug so they will take a bit of wearing-in. I have never had a size 11 before in my life. Other than that these are very comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, work in a hospital and use them all day everyday. Initially took a bit of wearing in, think it was partly my fault for ordering slightly too small. A bit wider than my feet but i do have slightly narrower feet, a bit wide and short but apart from that very comfy, grippy and do the job fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B

customer_reviews.title: Shoes nightmare
customer_reviews.text: These runners were way to small. I normally were a sizes 9 but after getting shoes before from Amazon and they not fitting right but having to keep them because I needed them for a wedding I decided to get a sizes bigger so I got sizes 10 but still these were way to small for me . I will not be buying any more shoes from Amazon in the future because it's just to much of a nightmare
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy,but do check the sizes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of this model. For someone who's got a pretty wide feet, these are great. I remember trying at least 10 different pairs of various brands and models, including Nike, however none of them fit as well as these. Also,keep in mind that you might want to get these at least half or even one size bigger than your actual foot size,as they are smaller than you'd expect. I'm 44-44.5 Europen, but I bought 46 to fit well,based on my previous purchases of the same model.
customer_reviews.author: NotMuchhere

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainer, just too tight for Nike
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 other pairs of Nike trainers that are labelled the 'same' size as these, they fit nicely but these are way too tight in the toe. I purchased UK size 11
customer_reviews.author: Mr S D Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, described as good, they were in fact just like brand new! Excellent seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Blakeley

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but I'm not sure about the size a little on the small size makes me question if the trainer are genuine.
customer_reviews.author: arinze madu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes and light weight material
customer_reviews.text: Classical that wont go out of style, fit perfectly if you know your True Nike chart size list. 1 full size up for most would do the right fit for this Nike model. Comfortable shoes and light weight material.
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful product
customer_reviews.text: Dreadful product you need to order at least 2 sizes bigger than your normal ssize
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Inner printing disappeared in two days.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good but the inner printing of Nike worn out in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Haris

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Md Runner 2 Gymnastics Shoes
feature_bullets: Der MD Runner 2 ist ein leichter Sneaker für Herren von Nike.
Veloursleder-Überzüge am Obermaterial für mehr Strapazierfähigkeit und Halt
Vollgummi-Außensohle mit Waffelprofil für Traktion und Strapazierfähigkeit
